title: Lexington 250
description: The flagship town for History Is For Everyone, celebrating Lexington's role in the American Revolution.
intention: Create the definitive digital resource for Lexington's 250th anniversary.
whatIDid: Curated and wrote content about Lexington's Revolutionary history
Built local business and event discovery features
Created itineraries for visitors and families
whatSurprisedMe: The depth of local enthusiasm for their town's history when presented in an engaging way.
